document_data.mainbody:
enebrux Morrow was an author who lived in the city of Waterdeep. She wrote herself into a series of pulp novels, entitled The True and Impossible Adventures of Tenebrux Morrow, about the the captains adventures aboard her planes-hopping vessel the New Bride.
While the fictional Captain Morrow was a daring adventurer, who met iconic characters across the planes, the real Tenebrux Morrow was a mild-mannered person who rarely left her room at the Yawning Portal inn. She traded in her new manuscripts for meals and writing supplies.
Her most famous works were published sometime during or before the .
